DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the HLA typed person is the donor.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles._Person; a human being._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.:Person; a human being.

Concepts.definition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Property.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.
